episodes.title: #22: Sarah Edmondson - Taking Down a Cult
episodes.description: This week on the pod we have the incredible Sarah Edmondson! Sarah is a Canadian actress and podcaster. She is a former member of the now de-bunked cult NXIVM. Courageously, In 2017, she left the group and confirmed longstanding criticism that NXIVM operated as a cult. She then chose to fight NXIVM's abusive practices which resulted in the downfall of the organization and its leaders. Sarah's story is one of bravery, courage and choosing to fight. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fa7uN2vo6rc&t=747s Support the Show.
